header.title: Product Launch Event
header.project: Dan Savi Car Showcase & Shaver Gaming Event
header.purpose: The meeting is to discuss the planning, budgeting, and logistical aspects of the Dan Savi Car Showcase and Shaver Gaming events, including media invites, vendor coordination, safety measures, and potential cross-promotions.
header.attendees: Alia, Rohimi, Azfar, Kang, Jet, Sebastian

tasks.Description: Follow up on Klang Sound's quote and availability
Inform client to stick with Center Court for the car showcase
Push Jumbo Rentals for at least a 10% cut
Draft the Shaver Gaming media invites
Lock in Can Lim's Twitch slot
Handle the Dan Savi media invites
Confirm the custom rack specs with Tech Zone and email the dash dimensions to use partner
Submit the police traffic permit applications for both events
Follow up with the fire department regarding the COVID-19 SOP and fire safety clearance for both events
Ping the vendor directly and get a concrete delivery date for the VR demo gear and update the share document
Map out specific routes and timings for loading and unloading for both events
Coordinate closely with mall operators to ensure minimal disruption to mallgoers during setup and tear down for both events
Talk to esports channel about featuring a segment on the CYD Nova EV
Reach out to Xbox and Logitech to explore cross-promotional budget
Chase Azfar on fire safety audit and get the clearance sorted
